pkgmetadata.longdescription: Adaptive Optimal Two-Stage Designs in R // Optimize one or two- arm, two-stage designs for clinical trials with respect to several pre-implemented objective criteria or implement custom objectives. Optimization under uncertainty and conditional (given stage-one outcome) constraints are supported. See Pilz M, Kunzmann K, Herrmann C, Rauch G, Kieser M. A variational approach to optimal two-stage designs. Statistics in Medicine. 2019;38(21):41594171. doi:10.1002/sim.8291 for details.
